name: macsio
description: A Multi-purpose, Application-Centric, Scalable I/O Proxy Application.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)

dependencies.name: silo
dependencies.description:
Silo is a library for reading and writing a wide variety of scientific
data to binary, disk files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: exodusii
dependencies.description:
Exodus II is a C++/Fortran library developed to store and retrieve data
for finite element analyses. It's used for preprocessing (problem
definition), postprocessing (results visualization), and data transfer
between codes. An Exodus II data file is a random access, machine
independent, binary file that is written and read via C, C++, or Fortran
API routines.

dependencies.name: typhonio
dependencies.description:
TyphonIO is a library of routines that perform input/output (I/O) of
scientific data within application codes

dependencies.name: scr
dependencies.description:
SCR caches checkpoint data in storage on the compute nodes of a Linux
cluster to provide a fast, scalable checkpoint/restart capability for
MPI codes

dependent_to.name: ecp-proxy-apps
dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of packages that represents the official suite of
DOE/ECP proxy applications. This is a Spack bundle package that installs
the ECP proxy application suite.
